# TwelvePtMovingWindowAverage

**Enumeration Case**

The 12-point moving window average filter algorithm.

## Declaration

```swift
TwelvePtMovingWindowAverage
```

## Discussion

Under this algorithm, the Host applies 12 point moving window average filter to the time stamps returned from [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioClockDevice/GetCurrentZeroTimestamp].

## Clock-Smoothing Algorithms

- **Raw**: An algorithm that uses timestamp values as-is.
- **SimpleIIR**: The simple IIR filter algorithm.
